title: Quick Tab Sync skipDeletions Pattern
details:
When hydrating Quick Tabs state from storage.onChanged events or tab visibility refresh, ALWAYS pass `skipDeletions: false` to trust storage as the single source of truth. This ensures:
1. Deleted Quick Tabs are properly removed across all tabs
2. Storage and memory state stay synchronized
3. Ghost Quick Tabs from old sessions are eliminated

Use `skipDeletions: true` (default) only for:
- Initial page load from cache (preserve local changes)
- BroadcastChannel message replay (additive sync)

Files affected:
- SyncCoordinator.handleStorageChange() - must use skipDeletions: false
- SyncCoordinator.handleTabVisible() - must use skipDeletions: false
